title: Regiment of Haradrim (4R244)
text:
Set:	The Two Towers
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Raider
Twilight:	8
Card Type:	Minion • Man
Strength:	16
Vitality:	4
Site:	4
Game Text:	Southron. To play, spot a [Raider] Man. Regroup: Exert Regiment of Haradrim twice to take control of a site.
Lore:	”'One of their regiments is due by our reckoning to pass by, some time ere noon….'”
Rarity:	R
